languages.text: "Я сталкивался с упоминанием ксеноартефактов данного типа в архивах. Если Вашей милости будет угодно, я проведу изучение этих... трофеев". {n}Бархатный, любопытный голос, льющийся из вокс-синтезатора, не осмеливается прервать ни единая статическая помеха.{/n}

"I have come across references to xeno-artefacts of this type in archives. If Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship allows, I will examine these... trophies." {n}A velvety, curious voice pours from the vox-synth, not interrupted by a single hiss of static.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Я сталкивался с упоминанием ксеноартефактов данного типа в архивах. Если Вашей милости будет угодно, я проведу изучение этих... трофеев". {n}Бархатный, любопытный голос, льющийся из вокс-синтезатора, не осмеливается прервать ни единая статическая помеха.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I have come across references to xeno-artefacts of this type in archives. If Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship allows, I will examine these... trophies." {n}A velvety, curious voice pours from the vox-synth, not interrupted by a single hiss of static.{/n}

"I have come across references to xeno-artefacts of this type in archives. If Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship allows, I will examine these... trophies." {n}A velvety, curious voice pours from the vox-synth, not interrupted by a single hiss of static.{/n}

"I have come across references to xeno-artefacts of this type in archives. If Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship allows, I will examine these... trophies." {n}A velvety, curious voice pours from the vox-synth, not interrupted by a single hiss of static.{/n}

"I have come across references to xeno-artefacts of this type in archives. If Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship allows, I will examine these... trophies." {n}A velvety, curious voice pours from the vox-synth, not interrupted by a single hiss of static.{/n}

languages.text: “我曾在档案中看到过关于这种异形文物的记载。如果您允许的话，大人，我希望可以检查一下这些……战利品。”{n}如天鹅绒般丝滑的好奇声音从音阵合成器中涌了出来，没有一丝静电的嘶嘶声。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I have come across references to xeno-artefacts of this type in archives. If Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship allows, I will examine these... trophies." {n}A velvety, curious voice pours from the vox-synth, not interrupted by a single hiss of static.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我曾在档案中看到过关于这种异形文物的记载。如果您允许的话，大人，我希望可以检查一下这些……战利品。”{n}如天鹅绒般丝滑的好奇声音从音阵合成器中涌了出来，没有一丝静电的嘶嘶声。{/n}

languages.text: 「この種の異種族のアーティファクトについて書かれた文献を、たまたま読んだことがあります。陛下さえ宜しければ、これらの…戦利品を調べましょう」{n}ビロードを滑るように、好奇心を含んだ声が、ジーッという雑音を挟むことなくヴォクスシンセから聞こえてくる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I have come across references to xeno-artefacts of this type in archives. If Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship allows, I will examine these... trophies." {n}A velvety, curious voice pours from the vox-synth, not interrupted by a single hiss of static.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「この種の異種族のアーティファクトについて書かれた文献を、たまたま読んだことがあります。陛下さえ宜しければ、これらの…戦利品を調べましょう」{n}ビロードを滑るように、好奇心を含んだ声が、ジーッという雑音を挟むことなくヴォクスシンセから聞こえてくる。{/n}

languages.text: "Mir sind in Archiven schon Referenzen auf Xeno-Artefakte dieser Art begegnet. Falls Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} es erlaubt, werde ich diese ... Trophäen untersuchen." {n}Eine samtene, neugierige Stimme erklingt aus dem Vox-Synth, von keinerlei Rauschen unterbrochen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I have come across references to xeno-artefacts of this type in archives. If Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship allows, I will examine these... trophies." {n}A velvety, curious voice pours from the vox-synth, not interrupted by a single hiss of static.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Mir sind in Archiven schon Referenzen auf Xeno-Artefakte dieser Art begegnet. Falls Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} es erlaubt, werde ich diese ... Trophäen untersuchen." {n}Eine samtene, neugierige Stimme erklingt aus dem Vox-Synth, von keinerlei Rauschen unterbrochen.{/n}

languages.text: « Je suis tombé sur des références à des xéno-artefacts de ce genre en consultant des archives. Si vous me le permettez, Votre Seigneurie, j'aimerais examiner ces... trophées, » {n}demande Pasqal d'une voix veloutée et teintée de curiosité, sans que le moindre grésillement l'interrompe.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I have come across references to xeno-artefacts of this type in archives. If Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship allows, I will examine these... trophies." {n}A velvety, curious voice pours from the vox-synth, not interrupted by a single hiss of static.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je suis tombé sur des références à des xéno-artefacts de ce genre en consultant des archives. Si vous me le permettez, Votre Seigneurie, j'aimerais examiner ces... trophées, » {n}demande Pasqal d'une voix veloutée et teintée de curiosité, sans que le moindre grésillement l'interrompe.{/n}

languages.text: «He encontrado referencias a artefactos xeno de este tipo en los archivos. Si mi{mf|lord|lady} me lo permite, examinaré estos... trofeos». {n}El voco sintetizador produce una voz curiosa y aterciopelada sin una sola interferencia de estática.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I have come across references to xeno-artefacts of this type in archives. If Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship allows, I will examine these... trophies." {n}A velvety, curious voice pours from the vox-synth, not interrupted by a single hiss of static.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «He encontrado referencias a artefactos xeno de este tipo en los archivos. Si mi{mf|lord|lady} me lo permite, examinaré estos... trofeos». {n}El vocosintetizador produce una voz curiosa y aterciopelada sin una sola interferencia de estática.{/n}

languages.text: "Arşivlerde bu tip zeno eserlerine dair referanslara denk gelmiştim. {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri izin verirse bu... Ganimetlerini incelemek isterim." {n}Voks sentezleyiciden herhangi bir parazit hışırtısıyla kesilmeyen, kadifemsi, meraklı bir ses çıkıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I have come across references to xeno-artefacts of this type in archives. If Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship allows, I will examine these... trophies." {n}A velvety, curious voice pours from the vox-synth, not interrupted by a single hiss of static.{/n}
